title: Exam stress is overwhelming me (परीक्षा का तनाव)
content: I have back-to-back exams और रात में नींद नहीं आती। Anyone else feeling the same? I need some motivation and study tips.

title: Difficulty making friends in college
content: I'm in my third year और अभी भी struggle करता हूँ close friends बनाने में। Everyone seems to have their groups already.
